entries.journal_entry_description: Seek the gadget specialist in Coronet and ask for his assistance in determining what the device you found on the Diktat's terminal does.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lt. Jasper suggested speaking with a gadget specialist he knows. Find out what the device found on the Diktat's terminal connection does.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: While the gadget specialist works on adjusting the device, do him a favor and collect a payment owed to him by a local businessman named Frye Troeman.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Frye Troeman has agreed to pay the gadget specialist if you'll do him a favor. Meet his supplier, and bring back the equipment he needs.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Frye Troeman set you up! He sent you into an ambush. Teach him a lesson by thrashing his lackeys.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: It's a Trap! Defeat Troeman's Lackeys
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Now that you've thoroughly thrashed Troeman's lackeys, find out if he's more receptive to paying his debt.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to the gadget specialst and give him the payment you collected from Troeman.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Report back to Lt. Jasper with the newly-adjusted device. It can now be used to pinpoint the location from which the remote data is being sent.
